review_data.title: Perfect take away
review_data.content: Very fresh and delicious food - had a veggie soup and a hummus, avocado sandwich. It’s the perfect take away 👌

review_data.title: Awesome!!
review_data.content: Great service and wonderful selection of sandwich to choose from. Pretzel bread was really good. Also has desert tarts!

review_data.title: Where is the meat?
review_data.content: The salami I had a Migg'a Mix was fresh and ok, but there was definitely not much meat in the sandwich. For 8 Francs I would have expected more. The Birchermüesli I had for dessert was good.

review_data.title: Small shop for sandwiches
review_data.content: They serve very good cold sandwiches They accept Cash only Breakfast only Closed at weekends and holidays

review_data.title: Fresh & tasty sandwiches, friendly owner
review_data.content: Migg’s Mix is located between Selnau and Stockerstrasse. It is a small walk-in/take away shop that specializes in homemade sandwiches, salads and pastries. Once you walk in the door, you will be greeted by the smiling and friendly gentleman that owns the place. He really...More

review_data.title: Sandwiches barbaros
review_data.content: Uno de los mejores sandwiches que comi. Mejores que otros con locales de comida rapida. Ademas la atencion es impecable....More

review_data.title: Beste sandwiche in ZH!!
review_data.content: Lecker sandwiche, gute Auswahl, alles frisch zubereitet, süsses und kleines Lokal & sehr freundliche, persönliche und tolle Bedienung!! Immer wieder...More

review_data.title: Sandwiches mit Stil la Miggs
review_data.content: Ein Hemingway bitte? Das sind wirklich die frischesten und qualitativ besten Sandwiches in Zürich, seit bald zwei Jahrzehnten mit Herzblut...More

review_data.title: Die mit Abstand besten Sandwiches in Zürich
review_data.content: Dies sind DIE besten Sandwiches in Zürich. Sie werden von Migg und einer Helferin mit grosser Sorgfalt und Liebe gemacht....More

review_data.title: great place
review_data.content: great little sandwich shop. You can find cold sandwiches, small cakes, fruit breads, croissant, drinks etc.The owner speaks also English and Italian (with a Friulan accent:).

review_data.title: The best sandwiches
review_data.content: Great food and the guys running the shop are amazing hosts. Would advise anyone to go there for lunch

review_data.title: Fresh sandwiches for outdoor lunch in Zurich downtown
review_data.content: It's a nice place to grab a fresh, tasty sandwich if you want to spend your lunch outdoors someplace in the Old Botanical Garden or on the Schanzengraben Canal. The sandwiches are moderately priced for this area and quality of food.

review_data.title: Sehr feine, selbstgemachte Sandwiches.
review_data.content: Zentral in Zürich an der Stockerstrasse gelegen, kann an bei Migg's wunderbare selbstgemachte Sandwiches kaufen. Diese werden täglich frisch zubereitet...More

review_data.title: Customer for more than 10 years
review_data.content: I am being customer for more than 10 years and have to say that Migg's never disappointed. He has the best sandwiches of Zurich down town. The prices are reasonnable considering that Migg's prepares them also à la minute, if any. The shop is particular...More

review_data.title: Die besten Sandwiches in der Umgebung von Zürich
review_data.content: Bestnoten für Sandwiches (Fleischvariationen und vegtarisch), Suppe, Ambiente und Freundlichkeit! Es können auch Vorbestellungen für Büroapéros etc. gemacht werden.

review_data.title: Small cozy original sandwich bar
review_data.content: Original, fresh and very tasty sandwiches served by the nice owner. A great alternative to the more mainstream lunch bars. Bring your food to the lake (100m away) and you have a perfect lunch!

review_data.title: Nicest sandwich place in town
review_data.content: Pros: - Very nice couple that runs the shop - Always fresh and tasty sandwiches - Fair prices Cons: - The guys are on vacation pretty often...:( - The shop is not allowed to accept lunch checks (payment system for companies that don't entertain their...More
